Justification: To assess for any cardiac abnormalities that may have contributed to the fainting episode.
To monitor blood pressure and assess for any fluctuations that may have caused the fainting episode.
To rule out hypoglycemia as a possible cause of the fainting episode.
To rule out any brain injury or other neurological abnormalities that may have caused the fainting episode.
To assess for any electrical activity in the brain that may have contributed to the fainting episode.
